title: Gossage vents his frustration
subtitle: Gossage vents his frustration
body: At his formal introduction on Wednesday as the newest member of the Hall of Fame, Bruce Sutter expressed dismay that he couldn't be accompanied through the shrine's doors by Goose Gossage.  Gossage feels the same way. Judging by his immediate reaction upon learning he'd again fallen short in voting by baseball writers, however, the Goose feels more, too.  Anger. Disbelief. Frustration. Tom Singer is a reporter for MLB.com. This story was not subject to the approval of Major League Baseball or its clubs.
author: Tom Singer
